🧮 Ultimate Percentage Calculator: Your Versatile Chrome Extension for Quick Calculations!

Tired of juggling between different calculators for various percentage tasks? Our Percentage Calculator Chrome extension is your all-in-one solution! Whether you're a student, professional, or anyone who deals with numbers, this powerful tool is designed to make your life easier.

🚀 Why Choose Our Percentage Calculator?

Our percentage calculator stands out with its versatility and user-friendly interface:

- 🔢 Four essential calculation types in one place
- 🖱️ Easy-to-use dropdown menu for switching between calculations
- 💾 Automatic history saving for your last 5 calculations

🛠️ Features That Make Our Percentage Calculator Shine

1. "Percentage of a Number": 
   Quickly find out what percentage one number is of another.

2. "Percentage Difference": 
   Calculate the percentage change between two numbers effortlessly.

3. "Increase or Decrease by Percentage": 
   Easily compute a number after increasing or decreasing it by a certain percentage.

4. "Number as a Percentage of Another": 
   Determine what percentage one number is of another in no time.

5. "Calculation History": 
   Keep track of your last 5 calculations for easy reference.

6. "Copy to Clipboard": 
   Share your results instantly with a single click.
